resources.string:
How to pay for DELY services via M-Pesa (Safaricom)
 
 ->Select “Pay Bill” from the M-Pesa menu
 ->Enter DELY business number (540540)
 ->Enter your Phone number
 ->Enter the amount you wish to pay 
 ->Enter your M-Pesa PIN
 Done

How to pay for DELY services via Airtel Money (Airtel)
 
 ->Select Airtel Money on your menu
 ->Select Make Payments
 ->Select Paybill
 ->Select other
 ->Enter Business name DELY
 ->Enter the amount in Kshs you want to pay
 ->Enter your secret Airtel Money PIN
 ->Under reference, enter DELY Account number
 Done

How to pay for DELY services via Eazzy Pay (Equity)
 
 ->Log in to Eazzy Banking app
 ->Click on the +(plus) sign
 ->Select Eazzy Pay
 ->Select Pay Bill
 ->Type company name (DELY)and select appropriately
 ->Enter the bill account number (540540)
 ->Enter amount
 ->Confirm transaction
 Done
